KnowledgeBase.Title: isPositive
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: isOdd isZero isNull isExact isEven isNegative

Function.Description: The isPositive function returns true if the specified argument is positive; otherwise, false is returned.

Brief.Overview: The isPositive function returns true if the specified argument {obj} is positive; otherwise, false is returned.
Brief.Usage: The isPositive function is used to determine if an object positive.

Syntax.Return: Returns true if the object is positive, false is returned otherwise
